file_content.text: Haven't you done enough? Just leave me to record the tragedy in the annals of this war's atrocities!
That was the only fraud I found. If you're looking for something else, it isn't here.
I--I've found something... but that's impossible. If this is a fake... where is the real first founding memorial vase?
You won't be needing it, then. Hand it over.
I'll be taking that.
Yes... yes, of course.
You work well under fire, ever thought about bounty hunting?
Nice job, old timer.
Don't be preposterous. I did nothing more than my duty to protect these cherished treasures.
You made a smart move.
Who would risk our precious history by hiding such a thing here?
You have what you want. Now please, leave. Please?
Only a few more to scan. Just another moment, please. Please don't kill me.
You're taking a terrible risk with these treasures--and so much blood!
I really don't know what you expect to find, but--look out!
W--what is all that noise?
Jackpot... how good are you at shooting with your hands full?
Oh, oh wow. Look at all this stuff. It's gorgeous.
Oh! Oh no, out! Please take your battles elsewhere! This museum has no strategic value.
I'm looking for a phony relic. That's all.
I'm not here for a fight.
You're gonna keel over if you keep that up. Just point out the fake and I'm gone.
Don't have a heart attack.
I'm only going to ask this once: Where's the fake?
Listen up, old man.
You must be mistaken. Each piece here is an irreplaceable artifact from Alderaan's long and distinguished heritage.
Some are thousands of years old. You must go before anything is damaged.
I'm not leaving until I find what I'm looking for.
No. I've got a job to do.
I won't lay a finger on a thing if you help me find what I'm looking for.
Lend me a hand, then.
I have cared for these antiquities for fifty-seven years--every item here is the genuine article.
I'll show you damaged.
Wrong answer. [Shove him away]
Please, I'm begging you! You mustn't touch; they are each priceless.
I can prove it to you. I have an integrity scanner we use for restoration work.
It will only take a few minutes to scan for anomal--oh no, the security cameras! They've spotted you. You can't fight in here.
Guess you'd better hurry, then.
Start searching.
Oh no, oh no, oh no....
Don't worry. They're not even gonna make it to the door.
I'll hold them off.
I can't believe this is happening....
Looks like you're out of time.
Back to Plan A. [Smash it all]
Stars! At least steal some of it!
And that's the way the collectible crumbles.
Why? Why? The legacy of Alderaan reduced to dust and wreckage!
Not as genuine as you thought.
Well, what have we here?
